default.title: Document Management
default.content: Upload, organize, and share case-related documents with proper version control and access permissions. Use consistent folder structures and naming conventions for easy document retrieval.

folder-organization.title: Folder Organization
folder-organization.content: Create and maintain a logical folder structure for each case. Use standard categories like Pleadings, Discovery, Evidence, and Correspondence for consistency.

document-sharing.title: Document Sharing
document-sharing.content: Share documents securely with team members, clients, and external parties. Control access permissions and track document sharing activities.

version-control.title: Version Control
version-control.content: Manage document versions to track changes and maintain document history. Use proper versioning conventions and approval workflows.
